page.title: 04Sports at Grampound School
page.content: It was July and it was our Sports Day which we have every year during the summer term.Everybody was getting ready for the event.The weather was hot and sunny with a gentle breeze.Chairs and tables were being taken down to the field.Lots of squeals of joy.Sweets were bought for the Infants if they won a race and medals for the Juniors if they had the highest number of points. After lunch children went to get changed into shorts and tee shirt and plimsolls.The Infants get a sweet every time they reach the end of a race,a bigger sweet for coming first or second.At the end of the afternoon all the points awarded to the Juniors for coming first second or third are added together.The first year with the highest number of points gets a medal as do the other junior years.
